item.title: Paytm Shares Slip Despite First-Ever Profit: Technical Charts Signal Short-Term Weakness, Say SEBI RAs
item.description: According to analysts, the stock must clear ₹1,060 resistance with volume to sustain bullish momentum.

item.title: Nifty Hovers Near 25,100 In Rangebound Trade; Tata Motors Gains, Paytm Slips
item.description: Analysts remain cautious amid FII outflows, low volatility, and mixed earnings; pegging Nifty support at 25,000 and resistance near 25,200.
